backend/main.mo: Actor implements user profiles, song management with storage blobs, playlists, favorites, and access control using authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI banner-related features tied to HomeChannelBanner.tsx with metadata and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, their responsibilities, and recent behavioral or styling changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, manifest, icons, root mount point, and loading the main TypeScript entry.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining metadata, theme colors, icons, categories, and launch behavior for the app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling app shell caching, specialized audio fetch behavior, and cache cleanup during activate.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling screen navigation, deep links, global providers, onboarding popup, and sign‑in modal.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: Header displaying the app logo, title, and subtitle with basic layout and styling.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeChannel: Displays and manages a channel banner with image upload, URL input, and clearing options.
Wraps the app layout with header, sidebar, optional starfield, footer, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Shows user playlists, handles playlist creation, and manages auth flow for creating playlists.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryT: Renders top tabs for switching between songs and playlists in the library.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Provides a bottom navigation bar with tabs for major screens, adapting to desktop mode optionally.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Implements mobile and desktop side navigation with menu items and an option to trigger PWA install.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/First: Displays a first‑launch welcome popup with guest and sign‑in options.
frontend/src/components/player/MusicPlay: Full music player component handling playback, seeking, volume, and play count updates.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.t: Displays a dismissible add-to-home-screen banner using sessionStorage and a custom A2HS hook.
frontend/src/components/SignInModal.tsx: Component rendering a modal or drawer for Internet Identity sign‑in with loading states and cancellation logic.
frontend/src/components/songs/CreatePlay: Dialog/drawer for creating a playlist and adding a song, with auth handling and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/songs/DownloadCh: Dialog/drawer that lets users choose between offline caching or downloading a song to their device.
frontend/src/components/songs/Horizontal: Compact horizontal song card showing artwork, metadata, engagement bar, and a play button.
Scrollable horizontal row component for grouping song cards under a section title.
frontend/src/components/songs/PlaylistCh: Dialog/drawer for toggling a song’s inclusion in user playlists with auth and loading states.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongCard.t: Full song card with artwork, play/delete controls, engagement bar, and overflow menu.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEditor: Editor dialog for adding songs with form fields, file uploads, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEngage: Displays like and play counts with an optional like button that handles engagement logic.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongListRo: Renders a clickable song row with artwork, play button, delete option, and overflow menu.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongOverfl: Provides song action menus for favorites, playlists, downloads, sharing, and offline caching with auth handling.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongsSortB: Renders a dropdown to select song sorting mode such as latest or most liked.
frontend/src/components/visual/Starfield: Creates an animated starfield background in dark mode using dynamically generated div elements.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags including enabling a desktop bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Manages authentication state, pending actions, sign‑in modal behavior, and return‑path restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Detects installability and exposes a function to trigger the browser’s add‑to‑home‑screen prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstLaunchWelcome: Controls whether a first‑launch welcome UI should show based on localStorage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBanner.ts: Manages persistent customizable home banner image via URL or uploaded file.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and login status via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Provides hooks to evaluate CSS media queries and detect mobile viewport size.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingAction.ts: Executes queued user actions after authentication and handles retries and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching, mutating, and updating song and playlist data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Manages user settings with context, localStorage persistence, and UI side effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongEngagement.ts: Handles liking and playing songs, triggering auth when needed and delegating to mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides theme context with light/dark mode persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, themes, and global styling behaviors including reduced animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutArtistScreen.tsx: Renders an about page with artist info and external links to social platforms.
frontend/src/pages/ContactScreen.tsx: Displays a contact page with message and email link for inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/CustomSongRequestsScr: Page offering custom song request info with links for support and email contact.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Fetches songs, manages playback and deletion, and displays new, top, and all songs with a music player.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryScreen.tsx: Shows user's library with tabs for songs and playlists, plus a music player and basic navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SearchScreen.tsx: Provides live song search with a query field, displays results, and includes playback controls.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Offers configurable audio, visual, and notification settings using UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/SongsScreen.tsx: Lists all songs with sorting, playback, deletion, and deep‑link support.
frontend/src/pages/SupportScreen.tsx: Displays support information and links for donating to the project.
frontend/src/pages/ThemesScreen.tsx: Allows switching between light and dark themes using themed selection cards.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Provides helpers to build, parse, and clear song deep‑link parameters from query or hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Handles audio URL validation, filename generation, and triggering song downloads via a temporary anchor.
frontend/src/utils/offlineAudioCache.ts: Implements caching, checking, removing, and clearing audio files using the browser Cache API for offline playback.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Offers Web Share API support and clipboard fallback utilities for sharing song links or text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters, including retrieval, persistence, and cleanup of values in query or hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current build state, high‑level feature plan, architecture notes, and known issues.
